sense.def:
Discouragement
je poskus, da bi koga prepričali, naj nečesa ne stori.

seg.quote: When I first started, I encountered opposition and discouragement.

sense.def:
A discouragement
je nekaj, zaradi česar nismo več voljni nekaj storiti, ker se bojimo posledic.

seg.quote: The submarines were a constant discouragement to naval movements.
